Connect with Stephen Email: spb@ecs.soton.ac.uk Tel: +44 23 8059 6663 ORCID On this page About Research Publications About Research Publications About Prof Steve Beeby holds a prestigious Royal academy of Engineering Chair in Emerging Technologies on the topic of e-textile engineering. His research interests involve the application of flexible electronics, smart printable materials and energy harvesting technologies to electronic textiles (e-textiles).
